armors.ictv: 改良型联合战术防弹衣

ammo_bag.name: 弹药包
ammo_bag.description:
To use the Ammo Bag, you place it by holding [G]. Once placed it cannot be moved, but it can be used by you and your crew by holding [F] to gain more ammunition. It can fully replenish the ammunition of one of your weapons 4 times. When the Ammo Bag is depleted, it will disappear. You can see how many uses are left by looking at the Ammo Bag.
The ammo bag is a portable bag, originally inteded to allow soldiers to carry extra ammunition with them into combat.

armor_bag.name: 护甲包
armor_bag.description:
To use the Armor Bag, hold [G] to put on your equipped armor. Until that, you will wear the Two-piece Suit.
The armor bag has only one use and when it is consumed, it disappears. The Armor Bag is a portable bag used to transport an armor of your choice, that can be used during a heist.

body_bag_case.name: 尸体袋箱
body_bag_case.description:
To use the Body Bag Case, you place it by holding [G]. Once placed, it cannot be moved, but it can be used by you and your crew by holding [F] to gain a body bag.
The Body Bag Case has limited uses. You can see how many uses are left by looking at the Body Bag Case. The Body Bag Case carries additional bags, used for the transportation of corpses during stealth.

doctor_bag.name: 医疗包
doctor_bag.description:
To use the Doctor Bag, you need to place it by holding [G]. Once placed it cannot be moved, but it can be used by you and your crew by holding [F] to regain health. Using the Doctor Bag will reset the amount of times the player can get downed before going into custody. It can only be used twice.
When the Doctor Bag is consumed, it disappears. You see how many uses are left by looking at the Doctor Bag.
The Doctor Bag is a portable bag, usually used by a physician or other medical profession to transport medical supplies and medicine

ecm_jammer.name: ECM干扰器
ecm_jammer.description:
To use the ECM Jammer, you need to place it by holding [G]. Once placed it cannot be moved and it will be active for 20 seconds.
You can toggle the ECM Jammer by pressing [F]. The ECM Jammer then has a chance to incapacitate your enemies within a certain radius. When consumed, it stops working.
An Electronic Countermeasure (ECM) is an electronic device designed to trick radar, sonar and other detection systems, easing your way towards your goal.

first_aid_kit.name: 急救包
first_aid_kit.description:
The First Aid Kit is a collection of supplies and equipment for use in giving first aid.
To use the First Aid Kit, you need to place it by holding [G]. Once placed it cannot be moved, but it can be used by you and your crew by holding [F] to regain health.
A deployed First Aid Kit can be used once and when it is consumed, it disappears.

sentry_gun.name: 炮台
sentry_gun.description:
To use the Sentry Gun, you need to place it by holding [G]. Upon deployment it will use up 30% of your weapons' total ammo. It can be destroyed by firing at it, but as long as it is not completely destroyed, picking it up will automatically repair it and return the remaining Sentry Gun ammo. As it runs out of ammo it will stop firing but it can be reloaded by re-deploying it after pick up.
The Sentry Gun automatically aims and fires at targets that are detected by its sensors. It's commonly used as a distraction, drawing attention from you and your team.

suppressed_sentry_gun.name: 消音炮台
suppressed_sentry_gun.description:
To use the Suppressed Sentry Gun, you need to place it by holding [G]. Upon deployment it will use up 30% of your weapons' total ammo. It can be destroyed by firing at it, but as long as it is not completely destroyed, picking it up will automatically repair it and return the remaining Sentry Gun ammo. As it runs out of ammo it will stop firing but it can be reloaded by re-deploying it after pick up.
The Suppressed Sentry Gun is the counterpart to the regular, louder Sentry Gun as it's more used to take out enemies than a classic distraction.

trip_mines_and_shaped_charges.name: Trip Mines and Shaped Charges
trip_mines_and_shaped_charges.description:
To use the Trip Mine, you need to place it by holding [G]. The trigger laser can be toggled between explosive mode and sensor by pressing [F].
To use Shaped Charges, you need to place it by holding [G]. Once placed it will detonate within a few seconds. Trip Mines are basically traps that will hurt or kill enemies crossing the beam. Shaped Charges are commonly used to open safes and doors. Both are a good addition to all combat situations.

blending_in.name: 匿迹隐形
blending_in.description:
提升1点隐蔽值。
当你身着护具时，将降低15%移动速度惩罚。
在结算时增加45%经验获得。

walk-in_closet.name: 衣帽间
walk-in_closet.description:
解锁放置物护甲包。在劫案过程中你可以使用护甲包替换你的护甲。
你的基础捡弹量提至135%。

fast_and_furious.name: 速度与激情
fast_and_furious.description:
你所造成的伤害将提升5%。该牌组对近战，投掷物，榴弹发射器，火箭发射器和弓弩无效。
提升20%你与医疗包的交互速度。

brute_strength-1.vr_description: After dashing the player will heal from 0 up to a maximum of 3 health depending on the amount of stamina consumed. Can only heal a maximum of 50 health every 5 seconds.

public_enemy_no_1.description:
You gain 10% more health.
Enemies nearby will prefer targeting you, whenever possible, while the Injector effect is active.
public_enemy_no_1.vr_description: The dash effect is now from 0 up to a maximum of 9.

balls_vs_bullets.name: Balls vs Bullets
balls_vs_bullets.description:
You gain 20% more health.
The amount of health received during the Injector effect is increased by 25% while below 50% health.
balls_vs_bullets.vr_description: The dash effect is now from 0 up to a maximum of 12.

right_to_the_top.name: Right to the Top
right_to_the_top.description:
You gain 40% more health.
For every 5 points of health gained during the injector effect while at maximum health, the recharge time of the injector is reduced by 1 second.
right_to_the_top.vr_description: The dash effect is now from 0 up to a maximum of 15.

smoker.name: Smoker
smoker.description:
Unlocks and equips the throwable Smoke Bomb.
When deployed, the smoke bomb creates a smoke screen that lasts for 10 seconds. While standing inside the smoke screen, you and any of your allies automatically avoid 50% of all bullets. Any enemies that stand in the smoke will see their accuracy reduced by 50%.
After the smoke screen dissipates, the Smoke Bomb is on a cooldown for 60 seconds, but killing enemies will reduce this cooldown by 1 second.
smoker.vr_description: After dashing the player will gain 1% up to a maximum of 6% dodge for 3 seconds depending on the amount of stamina consumed.

twitch.name: Twitch
twitch.description: Every time the player gets shot, 20% dodge chance is gained. This effect is reset once the player dodges and will not occur for the next 4 second.
twitch.vr_description: The dash effect is now from 1% up to a maximum of 7%.

subtle-3.name: Subtle
subtle-3.description: Your chance to dodge is increased by 15%.
subtle-3.vr_description: The dash effect is now from 1% up to a maximum of 8%.

agility_shield.name: Agility Shield
agility_shield.vr_description: The dash effect is now from 1% up to a maximum of 9%.

unseen_shadow.name: Unseen Shadow
unseen_shadow.description: All of your perk deck effects are increased by 100% while you are standing in the smoke screen. While any of your allies are standing in the smoke screen, they gain 10% dodge chance.
unseen_shadow.vr_description: The dash effect is now from 1% up to a maximum of 10%.

virtue.name: Virtue
virtue.description:
Unlocks and equips the Stoic Hip Flask.
Damage taken is now reduced by 75%. The remaining damage will be applied directly.
The 75% reduced damage will be applied over-time (12 seconds) instead.
You can use the throwable key to activate the Stoic Hip Flask and immediately negate any pending damage. The flask has a 10 second cooldown but time remaining will be lessened by 1 second per enemy killed.
virtue.vr_description: After dashing the player will heal from 0 up to a maximum of 3 health depending on the amount of stamina consumed. Can only heal a maximum of 50 health every 5 seconds.

un-moved.name: Un-moved
un-moved.description: All of your armor is converted and applied to your health.
un-moved.vr_description: The dash effect is now from 0 up to a maximum of 6.

calm.name: Calm
calm.description: After not taking damage for 4 seconds any damage-over-time you are still waiting to receive will be negated.
calm.vr_description: The dash effect is now from 0 up to a maximum of 9.

imperturbable.name: Imperturbable
imperturbable.description: When your health is below 35%, the cooldown of your flask will be reduced by 2 seconds for each enemy you kill instead of 1 second.
imperturbable.vr_description: The dash effect is now from 0 up to a maximum of 12.

enduring.name: Enduring
enduring.description: When damage-over-time is removed you will be healed for an additional 50% of the damage-over-time remaining at that point.
enduring.vr_description: The dash effect is now from 0 up to a maximum of 15.

soul_mates.name: Soul Mates
soul_mates.description:
Unlocks and equips the Gas Dispenser.
To activate the Gas Dispenser you need to look at another allied unit within a 18 meter radius with clear line of sight and press the throwable key to tag them.
Each enemy you or the tagged unit kills will now heal you for 15 health and the tagged unit for 7.5 health.
Each enemy you kill will now extend the duration of the effect by 1.3 seconds and reduce the cooldown timer by 2 seconds.
The effect will last for a duration of 2 seconds and has a cooldown of 12 seconds.
soul_mates.vr_description: After dashing the player will heal from 0 up to a maximum of 3 health depending on the amount of stamina consumed. Can only heal a maximum of 50 health every 5 seconds.

scent.name: Scent
scent.description: Your maximum health is increased by 20%.
scent.vr_description: The dash effect is now from 0 up to a maximum of 6.

synergy.name: Synergy
synergy.description:
Each enemy you or the tagged unit kills will now grant you 2 absorption up to a maximum of 20.
This effect will last until the perk deck item goes out of cooldown.
synergy.vr_description: The dash effect is now from 0 up to a maximum of 9.

inhale.name: Inhale
inhale.description: Your maximum health is increased by 20%.
inhale.vr_description: The dash effect is now from 0 up to a maximum of 12.

harmony.name: Harmony
harmony.description: Each enemy the tagged unit kills will now reduce your perk deck item cooldown timer by 2 seconds until you are no longer paired.
harmony.vr_description: The dash effect is now from 0 up to a maximum of 15.

code_glitch.name: Code Glitch
code_glitch.description:
Unlocks and equips the Pocket ECM Device.
Changing to another perk deck will make the Pocket ECM Device unavailable again. The Pocket ECM Device replaces your current throwable, it can be switched out if desired.	While in game you can use the throwable key to activate the Pocket ECM Device.
Activating the Pocket ECM Device before the alarm is raised will trigger the jamming effect, disabling all electronics and pagers for a 6 second duration.
Activating the Pocket ECM Device after the alarm is raised will trigger the feedback effect, granting a chance to stun enemies on the map every second for a 6 second duration.
The Pocket ECM Device has 2 charges with a 100 second cooldown timer, but each kill you perform will shorten the cooldown time by 6 seconds.

bit_decay.name: Bit Decay
bit_decay.description: Killing an enemy while the feedback effect is active will regenerate 20 health.

kluge.name: Kluge
kluge.description: Killing at least 1 enemy while the feedback or jamming effect is active will grant 20 dodge for 30 seconds.

botnet.name: Botnet
botnet.description: Crew members killing enemies while the feedback effect is active will regenerate 10 health.

crew_chief.name: 领队
crew_chief.description:
领队，亦被称为军师，他能在一个有组织的犯罪集团中独当一面，掌管属于自己的手下，并直接对上级负责。
当犯罪集团需要处理某人时，领队和他的人手会确保让那家伙尸骨无存。

muscle.name: 肌肉
muscle.description:
肌肉男是一个使用暴力来为他的黑手党上级"送信"的硬汉。他们是所有犯罪组织的中坚力量。
当你需要将一个人狠揍一顿，打断一些腿，压碎头颅或提醒人们谁是老大时，你就会需要他们。

armorer.name: 军械
armorer.description:
军械的前身是军队里的一名专家。军械师的工作是维护，修理和改进装甲。
任何有自尊心的犯罪集团都需要有人保障他们的战士在完成工作时拥有必要的保护。

rogue.name: 浪人
rogue.description:
浪人是一种神秘的罪犯，他们对使用卑鄙的诡计和致死的暴力手段有着与生俱来的天赋。正因如此。，浪人被雇来做从撬锁到偷盗或者欺诈之类的任何事情。
变化无常是一名合格浪人的标志———他的能力足以弥补他的力量。

hitman.name: 杀手
hitman.description:
地下组织的职业杀手有着比其他人更娴熟的近战和射击技巧。
犯罪集团通常将雇佣杀手作为最后的手段来宣誓权威、打击报复、或是消除竞争。

crook.name: 诡术/骗术师
crook.description:
诡术是罪犯中的艺术家。存在久远如同犯罪这词本身。
说实话，诡术欺诈师什么都能干，却又什么都不专精。他偷，骗，作弊，做着一切羞耻非法的勾当。

burglar.name: 夜贼/窃贼
burglar.description:
夜贼与生俱来的机敏所带来的好处已经不仅仅是撬门入室了。敏捷的夜贼能更快地开锁，打包，和回答对讲机。但这也让他们很难进行战斗。他们生存下去的诀窍就是隔岸观火。
这些天赋也给了夜贼对疼痛的较高耐受性，和迅速摆脱创伤的能力。

infiltrator.name: 间谍
infiltrator.description:
间谍是被政府或大型犯罪集团为了获取敌方情报而雇佣的特工，或者被企业雇佣来从竞争对手那窃取商业机密。
间谍是个懂得利用环境获得先手的近战专家。

sociopath.name: 疯子/反社会者
sociopath.description:
拥有反社会人格的疯子被普遍认为是最能让人留下深刻印象的罪犯之一。当然除此之外，疯子也不是什么善茬，这就是为什么大型组织见他都会选择绕道而过。
总而言之，很明显疯子擅长应对最暴力的工作。他对他自身犯下的罪行毫无愧疚，这就是他的危险之处。

gambler.name: 赌徒
gambler.description:
踏进战场的熔炉里需要技巧，刻苦和不止一点点的运气。世界上就是有那么些人同时具备这三点。$NL;$NL;运气是一个可望而不可及的能力。古希腊人认为，这是神的旨意。但它并不是，它无处不在，它是一种你可以获得的能力。它需要充分的准备和深谋远虑让你的棋子到位，最大限度地提高获得回报的几率。它更像是对之前努力的回报，而不是单纯的祈祷神明。
赌徒天赋牌组属于支援类牌组。任何人都可以帮助团队取得胜利，但是赌徒能使团队赢得更彻底。

grinder.name: 前卫/冲锋手
grinder.description:
通常来说，前卫是个十分刻苦的角色，而努力的回报就是：他们有足够的能力来扭转乾坤。
前卫总是冲在第一线并且教对手做人，他不管自己承受多大的伤害都会给予敌人最大的反击。

yakuza.name: 极道
yakuza.description:
极道是世界上最具威慑力的犯罪集团之一。仁侠是其信条，家族是其组织。极道驰名于严格的戒律，黑社会性质以及成员覆满全身的刺青。
流浪者，被社会遗弃之人，在极道懂得了给养自身。当他的行径愈发得体，就代表他不再是个被小瞧的人物。

ex-president.name: 前总统
ex-president.description:
"前总统"是最胆大妄为的抢劫团伙之一。无所畏惧形同比肩。"战胜死亡的恐惧"这个理念让他们走在了一起。
前总统成员不遵循规则，只认尾崎八项试炼，一条向大自然表达敬畏之心的轨迹之路。

maniac.name: 狂人/瘾君子
maniac.description: 狂人天赋牌组是疯狂且临危不惧的代表。时刻全身投入面对伤害，你的队友将获得由吉米坚不可摧的意念凝结成的临时防护盾。

anarchist.name: 安那其/反动派
anarchist.description: 无政府主义者相信社会秩序不应该由条子来维护，并且人们应该有能力自制。破坏，反抗，暴力只是为了达到更好的结果的手段。无政府主义者在战斗中从来不逃避，并勇敢面对冲击。他们是团队中强有力的队友———因为他们不仅仅为了钱而战，更为了毁灭的快感而奋斗着。

biker.name: 飞车党
biker.description:
飞车党是威慑全世界，无人不知晓的最大帮派。要想成为飞车党的一员，你必须得坚毅忠诚，并清楚：帮派之内，规则至上。飞车党成员都是出了名的冷血暴力，并且不畏惧向任何"绊脚石"发出挑战。
一旦你穿上装备骑上机车，就等同于向世人宣告你属于那1%，拒绝社会规则、打着"就是违法你拿老子怎样"的信条的那1%。作为一名飞车党，重要的东西只有俩———你的兄弟和你的坐骑。

kingpin.name: 霸王/金并
kingpin.description: 霸王是名领导者，也是名逼迫他人遵守他所有念头的独裁者。但要想成为霸王。首先你得要有钱。当你有了钱，你就有权。记住，这世上唯一能下令的...只有胆识。

sicario.name: 刺客
sicario.description: 刺客是每一个毒枭集团必须的一份子，毕竟总得有个人以残忍的方式来干脏活。刺客永远不会逃避，他们只专注于工作，不管手段如何，不留惧怕妥协，不带一丝怜悯。

stoic.name: 斯多葛/修士
stoic.description: 你拥有坚如墙般的意志和镇定自若的思维。精神上的自律让斯多葛渡过能让普通人陷入崩溃的处境。结合从僧侣那学来的吐纳与肉体锻炼，你能更持久的完成任务，无论敌人向你射来何物。

tag_team.name: 双档/双人搭档
tag_team.description: 你知道什么是比"互相分享经验"还要棒的吗？当然是互相分享能提高自身能力的嗨气了！当你和你的队友在洗劫金库或是干票的时候，将这特别的礼物(指嗨气)送给特别的他(指劫匪)真是再合适不过了。

hacker.name: 黑客
hacker.description: 凭借敏锐的头脑和精良的装备，你能够只按几个按钮就把所有安保系统瘫痪。你永远也不会被监控和安保发现，就算事情出了差错，你也能轻易地进入敌人的通讯系统，并给他们的鼓膜一个大大的惊喜。

combat_medic.name: 医疗兵
combat_medic.description:
基础：1点	救起队友途中及救起队友后，你都将在5秒内获得30%伤害减免。
精通：3点	救起队友将给予他们30%额外血量。

quick_fix.name: 快速包扎
quick_fix.description:
BASIC: 2 points	Decreases your First Aid Kit and Doctor Bag deploy time by 50%.
ACE: 4 points	Crew Members that use your First Aid Kits or Doctor Bags take 10% less damage for 120 seconds.

painkillers.name: 止痛药
painkillers.description:
BASIC: 2 points	Crew members you revive take 30% less damage for 5 seconds.
ACE: 4 points	The damage reduction is increased by an additional 50%

uppers.name: 兴奋剂
uppers.description:
BASIC: 3 points	Adds 7 more First Aid Kits to your inventory.
ACE: 6 points	Adds 3 First Aid Kits to your inventory. Your deployed First Aid Kits will be automatically used if a player is downed within a 5 meter radius of the First Aid Kit. This cannot occur more than once every 20 seconds.

combat_doctor.name: 战地医师
combat_doctor.description:
BASIC: 3 points	You can now deploy 2 Doctor Bags instead of just one.
ACE: 6 points	Your doctor bags have 2 more charges.

inspire.name: 激励
inspire.description:
BASIC: 4 points	You revive crew members 100% faster. Shouting at your teammates will increase their movement and reload speed by 20% for 10 seconds.
ACE: 8 points	There is a 100% chance that you can revive crew members at a distance of up to 9 meters by shouting at them. This cannot occur more than every 20 seconds.

forced_friendship.name: 强制友谊
forced_friendship.description:
BASIC: 1 point	Increase your supply of cable ties by 4. You can cable tie hostages 75% faster.
ACE: 3 points	You and your crew gain 0.5 damage absorptions for each hostage you have. This effect stacks with up to a maximum of 8 hostages.
Note: This skill does not stack with other players Forced Friendship skill.

confident.name: 狂妄
confident.description:
BASIC: 2 points	The power and range of your intimidation is increased by 50%.
ACE: 4 points	You can now have 2 converted enemies at the same time.

joker.name: 小丑
joker.description:
BASIC: 2 points	You can convert a non-special enemy to fight on your side.	This can not be done during stealth and the enemy must have surrendered in order for you to convert them.
You can only convert one non-special enemy at a time.
ACE: 4 points	Your converted enemy deals 35% more damage. The time to convert an enemy is reduced by 65%.

stockholm_syndrome.name: 人质综合征
stockholm_syndrome.description:
BASIC: 3 points	Civilians are intimidated by the noise you make and remain intimidated 50% longer.
ACE: 6 points	Your hostages will not flee when they have been rescued by law enforcers. Whenever you get into custody, your hostages will trade themselves for your safe return. This effect can occur during assaults, but only 1 time during a heist.

partners_in_crime.name: 共犯
partners_in_crime.description:
BASIC: 3 points	Having a converted enemy increases your movement speed by 10%.
Your converted enemy takes 45% less damage.
ACE: 6 points	Having a converted enemy increases your health by 30%.
Your converted enemy takes an additional 54% less damage.

hostage_taker.name: 绑匪
hostage_taker.description:
BASIC: 4 points	Having at least one of your own hostage or converted law enforcer makes you regenerate 1.5% health every 5 seconds.
ACE: 8 points	Having at least one of your own hostage or converted law enforcer makes you regenerate 4.5% health every 5 seconds.

stable_shot.name: 稳定射击
stable_shot.description:
BASIC: 1 point	You gain 8 weapon stability.
ACE: 3 points	You gain 16 weapon accuracy while standing still.

rifleman.name: 步枪手
rifleman.description:
BASIC: 2 points	Your snap to zoom is 100% faster with all weapons.
Your movement speed is unhindered while using steel sight.
ACE: 4 points	Your weapon zoom level is increased by 25% with all weapons. Your weapon accuracy while moving with SMGs, Assault Rifles and Sniper Rifles is increased by 16.
rifleman.vr_description: Addition in VR:	BASIC: Every kill while aiming down sight will regenerate 2% stamina.	Every 25 points of stamina consumed by dashing will refill 5% of their ammo pool to single shot weapons.	ACE: The improved accuracy lasts from 1 up to a maximum of 5 seconds after dashing.

marksman.name: 精确射手
marksman.description:
BASIC: 2 points	You gain 8 weapon accuracy with all SMGs, Assault Rifles and Sniper Rifles fired in single shot fire mode.
ACE: 4 points	You gain a 20% accuracy bonus while aiming down sights with all SMGs, Assault Rifles and Sniper Rifles fired in single shot fire mode.

ammo_efficiency.name: 效率弹药
ammo_efficiency.description:
BASIC: 3 points	Getting 3 headshots in less than 6 seconds will refund 1 bullet to your used weapon. Can only be triggered by SMGs, Assault Rifles and Sniper Rifles fired in single shot fire mode.
ACE: 6 points	The amount of headshots required is reduced to 2.

aggressive_reload.name: 激进装填
aggressive_reload.description:
BASIC: 3 points	Increases your reload speed with SMGs, Assault Rifles and Sniper Rifles by 15%.
ACE: 6 points	Any killing headshot will increase your reload speed by 100% for 4 seconds. Can only be triggered by SMGs, Assault Rifles and Sniper Rifles fired in single shot fire mode.

graze.name: 擦伤
graze.description:
BASIC: 4 points	Snipers that hit their target deal 20% of the damage dealth in a 100cm radius around the bullet trajectory.
ACE: 8 points	If a bullet would headshot-kill someone, the graze skill will deal 100% of the weapon's damage instead of 20%.

underdog.name: 落水狗
underdog.description:
BASIC: 1 point	When three or more enemies within 10 meters are targeting you, you receive a 15% damage bonus that lasts for 7 seconds.
ACE: 3 points	When three or more enemies within 18 meters are targeting you, you also receive a 10% damage reduction that lasts for 7 seconds.
Note: Does not apply to melee damage, throwables, grenade launchers or rocket launchers.

shotgun_cqb.name: 霰弹枪CQB
shotgun_cqb.description:
BASIC: 2 points	You reload Shotguns 15% faster.
ACE: 4 points	You reload Shotguns 35% faster. You gain a 125% increased steel sight zoom speed when using Shotguns.
shotgun_cqb.vr_description: Addition in VR:	ACE: Every kill while aiming down sight will regenerate 2% stamina.

shotgun_impact.name: 霰弹冲击
shotgun_impact.description:
BASIC: 2 points	Your weapon stability with all shotguns is increased by 8. You deal 5% more damage with Shotguns.
ACE: 4 points	You deal an additional 10% more damage with shotguns.

far_away.name: 远射
far_away.description:
BASIC: 3 points	Your accuracy bonus while aiming down sights with Shotguns is increased by 40%.
ACE: 6 points	You gain a 50% increased effective range with Shotguns when aiming down sights.

close_by.name: 突进
close_by.description:
BASIC: 3 points	You can now hip-fire with your Shotguns while sprinting.
ACE: 6 points	Your rate of fire is increased by 35% while firing from the hip with single shot Shotguns. Sotguns with magazines have their magazine sizes increased by 15 shells
close_by.vr_description: Addition in VR:	BASIC: After dashing the player kills have a 100% chance to fear enemies within 8 meters of the player for 1 up to a maximum of 3 seconds depending on the amount of stamina consumed by the jump.

overkill.name: 杀戮
overkill.description:
BASIC: 4 points	When you kill an enemy with a Shotgun or the OVE9000 portable saw, you receive 75% damage increase for 20 seconds.
ACE: 8 points	The damage bonus now applies to all weapons. Skill must still be activated using a Shotgun or the OVE9000 portable saw. Your weapon swap speed is increased by 80%.
Note: Does not apply to melee damage, throwables, grenade launchers or rocket launchers.

resilience.name: 韧性
resilience.description:
BASIC: 1 point	Increases your armor recovery rate by 15%.
ACE: 3 points	Reduces the visual effect duration of Flashbangs by 75%.

die_hard.name: 虎胆龙威
die_hard.description:
BASIC: 2 points	You take 50% less damage while interacting with objects.
ACE: 4 points	Increases the armor of all Ballistic vests by 20.

transporter.name: 运输者
transporter.description:
BASIC: 2 points	You can throw bags 50% further.
ACE: 4 points	For each 10 armor points the bag movement penaly is reduced by 1%.

shock_and_awe.name: 震慑
shock_and_awe.description:
BASIC: 3 points	Increases the armor recovery rate for you and your crew by 25%.
ACE: 6 points	Enables your weapons to have a chance to knock back Shield enemies when attacking them. Ranged weapons' knockback chance is increased the higher the total damage of the weapon is. Melee weapons' knockback chance is 100%.

bullseye.name: 正中靶心
bullseye.description:
BASIC: 3 points	You regenerate 5 armor for each succesful headshot. This can not occur more than once every 2 seconds.
ACE: 6 points	You regenerate an additional 20 armor for each succesful headshot.

iron_man.name: 铁人
iron_man.description:
BASIC: 4 points	Your total armor value is increased by 30%.
ACE: 8 points	Unlocks the ability to wear the Improved Combined Tactical Vest.

scavenger.name: 拾荒者
scavenger.description:
BASIC: 1 point	Your ammo pick up range is increased by 50%.
ACE: 3 points	Every 6th enemy you kill will drop an extra ammo box.

bulletstorm.name: 子弹风暴
bulletstorm.description:
BASIC: 2 points	Ammo bags placed by you grant players the ability to shoot without depleting their ammunition for up to 5 seconds after interacting with it. The more ammo players replenish, the longer the duration of the effect.
ACE: 4 points	Increases the base duration of the effect by up to 15 seconds.

portable_saw.name: 便携式电锯
portable_saw.description:
BASIC: 2 points	Unlocks the OVE9000 portable saw for you to use as a secondary weapon.
ACE: 4 points	You gain 1 extra saw blade for the OVE9000 portable saw. You replace your saw blades with carbon blades, increasing your saw efficiency by 40%.

extra_lead.name: 额外弹药
extra_lead.description:
BASIC: 3 points	You can now place 2 ammo bags instead of just one.
ACE: 6 points	Each ammo bag now contains 50% more ammunition.

saw_massacre.name: 电锯狂杀
saw_massacre.description:
BASIC: 3 points	Reducing the wear down of the blades on enemies by 50%.
ACE: 6 points	You can now saw through shield enemies with your OVE9000 portable saw. When killing an enemy with the saw, you have a 50% chance to cause nearby enemies in a 10m radius to panic. Panic will make enemies go into short bursts of uncontrollable fear.

fully_loaded.name: 全副武装
fully_loaded.description:
BASIC: 4 points	Your total ammo capacity is increased by 25%.
ACE: 8 points	Increases the amount of ammo you gain from ammo boxes by 75%. You also gain a 5% base chance to get a throwable from an ammo box. The base chance is increased by 1% for each ammo box you pick up that does not contain a throwable. When a throwable has been found, the chance is reset to it's base value
Note: Does not stack with the perk deck skill "Walk-in Closet".

third_law.name: 第三定律
third_law.description:
BASIC: 1 point	The cost of deploying a sentry gun is reduced by 5%.
ACE: 3 points	Your sentry guns gain a protective shield.

sentry_targeting_package.name: 炮台精准修正
sentry_targeting_package.description:
BASIC: 2 points	Your sentry guns gain a 100% increase in accuracy.
ACE: 4 points	Your sentry guns rotation speed is increased by 150%. Your sentry guns also have 50% more ammunition.

eco_sentry.name: 经济炮台
eco_sentry.description:
BASIC: 2 points	The cost of deploying a sentry gun is reduced by 5%.
ACE: 4 points	Your sentry guns gain 150% increased health.

engineering.name: 工程学
engineering.description:
BASIC: 3 points	You can now select a less noisy version of the sentry guns, making them much less likely to be targeted by enemies.
ACE: 6 points	You can now toggle AP rounds on your sentry guns, lowering the rate of fire by 75%, but increasing damage by 250% and allowing it to pierce through enemies and shields.

jack_of_all_trades.name: 万事通
jack_of_all_trades.description:
BASIC: 3 points	You deploy and interact with all deployable 100% faster.
ACE: 6 points	You can now equip a secondary deployable to bring with you. If your deployable is equipped as a secondary deployable, you can only bring half of what you should bring if it was equipped as a primary deployable.

tower_defense.name: 塔防
tower_defense.description:
BASIC: 4 points	You can now carry 1 extra sentry gun.
ACE: 8 points	You can now carry an additional 2 extra sentry guns.

hardware_expert.name: 硬件专家
hardware_expert.description:
BASIC: 1 point	You fix drills and saws 25% faster. Decreases trip mine deploy time by 20%. Drills and saws are also silent. Civilians and guards must see the drill or saw in order to become alerted.
ACE: 3 points	Gives your drills and saws a 10% chance to automatically restart after breaking
Note: Skill does not affect the OVE9000 saw.

combat_engineering.name: 战地工程
combat_engineering.description:
BASIC: 2 points	The radius of your trip mine explosion is increased by 30%.
ACE: 4 points	Your trip mine damage is increased by 50%.

drill_sawgeant.name: 钻锯军士
drill_sawgeant.description:
BASIC: 2 points	Your drill and saw timer is decreased by 15%.
ACE: 4 points	Your drill and saw timer is decreased by an additional 15%.
Note: Skill does not affect the OVE9000 saw

more_firepower.name: 更多火力
more_firepower.description:
BASIC: 3 points	You gain 1 more shaped charge and 4 more trip mines.
ACE: 6 points	You gain more shaped charges and 7 more trip mines.

kickstarter.name: 脚踹钻机
kickstarter.description:
BASIC: 3 points	Your drills and saws gain an additional 20% chance to automatically restart after breaking.
ACE: 6 points	Enables the ability to reset a broken drill or saw with a melee attack. The ability has a 50% chance to fix the drill or saw. The ability can only be used once per time the drill or saw is broken.
Note: Skill does not affect the OVE9000 saw.

fire_trap.name: 火焰陷阱
fire_trap.description:
BASIC: 4 points	Your trip mines now spread fire around the area of detonation for 10 seconds in a 4 meter diameter.
ACE: 8 points	Increases the fire effect duration by 10 seconds and increases the fire effect radius by 50%.

steady_grip.name: 稳定握把
steady_grip.description:
BASIC: 1 point	You gain 8 weapon accuracy.
ACE: 3 points	You gain 16 weapon stability.

heavy_impact.name: 沉重打击
heavy_impact.description:
BASIC: 2 points	Your shots have a 5% chance to stagger all enemies except Bulldozers and Captain Winters.
ACE: 4 points	Increases your stagger chance to 20%.

fire_control.name: 火力控制
fire_control.description:
BASIC: 2 points	You gain 12 weapon accuracy while firing from the hip.
ACE: 4 points	Your accuracy penalty is decreased by 20% when shooting while moving.
fire_control.vr_description: Addition in VR:	ACE: The decreased accuracy penalty lasts from 1 up to a maximum of 5 seconds after dashing.

lock_n_load.name: 重装攻势
lock_n_load.description:
BASIC: 3 points	You can how hip-fire with your weapons while sprinting.
ACE: 6 points	Killing 2 enemies with SMGs, LMGs, Assault Rifles or Special Weapons set on automatic fire mode will increase your next reload speed by up to 100%. This bonus is reduced by 1% for each bullet above 20 in the total magazine size, down to a maximum of 40% reload speed increase.
lock_n_load.vr_description: Addition in VR:	BASIC: Every 40 points of stamina consumed by dashin will refill 5% of their ammo pool to automatic weapons.

surefire.name: 万全之策
surefire.description:
BASIC: 3 points	 Your SMGs, LMGs and Assault Rifles gain 15 more bullets in their magazines. This does not affect the "Lock n' Load" Ace skill.
Ace: 6 points	Your ranged weapons can now pierce through enemy body armor.
Note: Does not apply to throwable weapons.

body_expertise.name: 人体解析
body_expertise.description:
BASIC: 4 points	30% from the bonus headshot damage is permanently applied to hitting enemies on the body. This skill is only activated by SMGs, LMGs, Assault Rifles or Special Weapons fired in automatic fire mode.
ACE: 8 points	90% from the bonus headshot damage is permanently applied to hitting enemies on the body. This skill is only activated by SMGs, LMGs, Assault Rifles or Special Weapons fired in automatic fire mode.

chameleon.name: 变色龙
chameleon.description:
BASIC: 1 point	Increases the time before you start getting detected by 25% while in casing mode. You can also mark enemies while in casing mode.
ACE: 3 points	You can pick up items while in casing mode. You can also gain 30% more value to items and cash that you pick up.

cleaner.name: 清道夫
cleaner.description:
BASIC: 2 points	You gain 1 additional body bag in your inventory. Also increases the body bag inventory space to 3.
ACE: 4 points	You gain the ability to place 2 body bags cases.

sixth_sense.name: 第六感
sixth_sense.description:
BASIC: 2 points	You gain the ability to automatically mark enemies within a 10 meter radius around you after standing still for 3.5 seconds while in stealth.
ACE: 4 points	You gain access to all insider assets. Cleaning costs after killing a civilian is reduced by 75%.

nimble.name: 机敏
nimble.description:
BASIC: 3 points	You gain the ability to disable 1 camera from detecting you and your crew. Effect lasts for 25 seconds.
ACE: 6 points	You lockpick 100% faster. You also gain the ability to lockpick safes.

ecm_overdrive.name: ECM过载
ecm_overdrive.description:
BASIC: 3 points	Your ECM jammer and feedback duration is increased by 25%.
ACE: 6 points	Your ECM jammer can now also be used to open certain electronic doors.

ecm_specialist.name: ECM专家
ecm_specialist.description:
BASIC: 4 points	You can now place 2 ECM jammers instead of just one.
ACE: 8 points	The ECM jammer duration is increased by an additional 25% and the ECM feedback duration lasts 25% longer. Pagers are delayed by the ECM jammers.

duck_and_cover.name: 蹲防战术
duck_and_cover.description:
BASIC: 1 point	Your stamina starts regenerating 25% earlier and 25% faster. You also sprint 25% faster.
ACE: 3 points	You have a 10% increased chance to dodge while sprinting you gain 15% chance to dodge while ziplining.
duck_and_cover.vr_description: Addition in VR	ACE: The increased dodge chance lasts from 1 up to a maximum of 5 seconds after dashing.

parkour.name: 跑酷
parkour.description:
BASIC: 2 points	You gain 10% additional movement speed and 20% increased speed while climbing ladders.
ACE: 4 points	You gain the ability to sprint in any direction.
Run and reload — you can reload your weapons while sprinting
parkour.vr_description: Addition in VR:	ACE: After dashing you will get 20% up to a maximum of 50% reload speed increase.

inner_pockets.name: 内层袋
inner_pockets.description:
BASIC: 2 points	Increases the concealment of melee weapons by 2.
ACE: 4 points	Increases the concealment of all ballistic vests by 4.

dire_need.name: 极端需求
dire_need.description:
BASIC: 3 points	When your armor breaks, the first shot on every enemy will cause that enemy to stagger. This effect ends when your armor recovers.
ACE: 6 points	The effect persists for 6 after your armor has recovered.

shockproof.name: 防电保护
shockproof.description:
BASIC: 3 points	When tased, the shock effect has a 30% chance to backfire on the Taser, knocking them back.
ACE: 6 points	When tased, you are able to free yourself from the taser by interacting with it within 2 seconds of getting tased.

sneaky_bastard.name: 卑鄙小人
sneaky_bastard.description:
BASIC: 4 points	You gain a 1% chance for every 3 points of detection rate under 35 up to 10%.
ACE: 8 points	You gain a 1% dodge chance for every 1 point of detection rate under 35 up to 10%.

second_wind.name: 第二春
second_wind.description:
BASIC: 1 point	When your armor breaks your movement speed is increased by 30% for 5 seconds.
ACE: 3 points	This effect also applies to your crew when triggered.

optical_illusions.name: 光学幻象
optical_illusions.description:
BASIC: 2 points	You are 35% less likely to be targeted by enemies.
ACE: 4 points	You gain 1 concealment for each silenced weapon you equip and reduces the concealment penalty of silencers by 2.

the_professional.name: 专业人士
the_professional.description:
BASIC: 2 points	You gain 8 weapon stability and 100% snap to zoom speed increase with silenced weapons.
ACE: 4 points	You gain 12 weapon accuracy with silenced weapons.
the_professional.vr_description: Addition in VR:	BASIC: Every kill while aiming down sight will regenerate 2% stamina.

low_blow.name: 下作手段
low_blow.description:
BASIC: 3 points	You gain a 3% critical hit for every 3 points of detection rate under 35 up to 30%.
ACE: 6 points	You gain 3% critical hit chance for every 1 point of detection rate under 35 up to 30%.
Note: Does not apply to grenade launchers.

high_value_target.name: 高价目标
high_value_target.description:
BASIC: 3 points	Enemies you mark take 15% more damage.
ACE: 6 points	Enemies you mark take an additional 50% damage when further away than 10 meters. Increase the duration of marked enemies by 100% and you can now mark specials by aiming down at them with any weapon.

unseen_strike.name: 隐匿袭击
unseen_strike.description:
BASIC: 4 points	If you do not lose any armor or health for 4 seconds, you gain 35% critical hit chance for 6 seconds.
ACE: 8 points	The critical hit chance duration is increased to 18 seconds.
Taking any damage will cancel the effect.

equilibrium.name: 沉着
equilibrium.description:
BASIC: 1 point	Decreases the time it takes to draw end holster pistols by 33%.
ACE: 3 points	You gain 8 weapon accuracy with all pistols.

gun_nut.name: 枪械狂
gun_nut.description:
BASIC: 2 points	Your pistoll magazine sizes are increased by 5 bullets.
ACE: 4 points	You gain a 50% increased rate of fire with pistols.

akimbo.name: 双持
akimbo.description:
BASIC: 2 points	Your Akimbo weapons' stability penalty is reduced by 8.
ACE: 4 points	Your Akimbo weapons' stability penalty is reduced by an additional 8 and they also have 50% increased ammo capacity.

one_handed_talent.name: 只手遮天
one_handed_talent.description:
BASIC: 3 points	The base damage of all pistols is increased by 5.
ACE: 6 points	The base damage of all pistols is increased by an additional 10 damage.

desperado.name: 亡命之徒
desperado.description:
BASIC: 3 points	Each successful pistol hit gives you a 10% accuracy bonus for 10% and you can stack it 4 times.
ACE: 6 points	You reload 50% faster.

trigger_happy.name: 乱枪狂人
trigger_happy.description:
BASIC: 4 points	For every hit with a pistol you gain a 120% damage boost that lasts for 2 seconds.	Stacks up to 1 time.
ACE: 8 points	Increases the damage boost duration to 4 seconds.

nine_lives.name: 九命猫
nine_lives.description:
BASIC: 1 point	You gain a 50% increase to your bleedout health.
ACE: 3 points	You gain the ability to get downed 1 more time before going into custody.

running_from_death.name: 死里逃生
running_from_death.description:
BASIC: 2 points	You reload and swap weapons 100% faster for 10% seconds after being revived.
ACE: 4 points	You move 30% faster for 10 seconds after being revived.

up_you_go.name: 卷土重来
up_you_go.description:
BASIC: 2 points	You take 30% less damage for 10 seconds after being revived.
ACE: 4 points	You receive 40% more health when revived.

swan_song.name: 绝唱
swan_song.description:
BASIC: 3 points	Instead of getting downed instantly, you gain the ability to keep on fighting for 3 seconds with a 60% movement penalty before going down.
Note: Does not trigger on fall or fire damage.
ACE: 6 points	Increases the duration of Swan Song by 3 seconds. Ammunition won't be depleted while the effect is active.

feign_death.name: 诈死
feign_death.description:
BASIC: 3 points	When you get downed, you have a 15% chance to instantly get revived
ACE: 6 points	The chance to get instantly revived is increased by an additional 30%.

messiah.name: 弥赛亚
messiah.description:
BASIC: 4 points	While in bleedout, you can revive yourself if you kill an enemy. You only have 1 charge.
ACE: 8 points	Your messiah charge is replenished whenever you use a doctor bag.

martial_arts.name: 武术
martial_arts.description:
BASIC: 1 point	You take 50% less damage from all melee attacks. Because of training.
ACE: 3 points	You are 50% more likely to knock down enemies with a melee strike.

bloodthirst.name: 嗜血
bloodthirst.description:
BASIC: 2 points	Every kill you get will increase your next melee attack damage by 100%, up to a maximum of 1600%. This effect gets reset when you kill an enemy with a melee attack.
ACE: 4 points	Whenever you kill an enemy with a melee attack, you will gain a 50% increase in reload speed for 10 seconds.

pumping_iron.name: 钢铁之击
pumping_iron.description:
BASIC: 2 points	Your melee attacks against non-special enemies do 100% more damage.
ACE: 4 points	Your melee attacks against special enemies do 100% more damage

counterstrike.name: 后发制人
counterstrike.description:
BASIC: 3 points	When charging your melee weapons you will counterattack enemies that try to strike you, knocking them down. The knockdown does not deal any damage
ACE: 6 points	You gain the ability to counterattack cloakers and their kicks

berserker.name: 狂战士
berserker.description:
BASIC: 3 points	The lower your health, the more damage you do. When your health is below 50%, you will do up to 250% more melee and saw damage.
ACE 6 points	The lower your health, the more damage you do. When your health is below 50%, you will do up to 100% more damage with ranged weapons as well.
Note: Does not apply to throwables, grenade launchers or rocket launchers.
Entering berserker state negates third-party regeneration effects.

frenzy.name: 狂乱
frenzy.description:
BASIC: 4 points	You only get 30% of your maximum health and cannot heal above it but you take 10% less damage and healing received is reduced by 75%.
ACE: 8 points	Damage taken is now reduced by 25% and healing received is reduced by 0%

matryoshka_grenade.name: Matryoshka Grenade
matryoshka_grenade.description: The Matryoshka Grenade is a throwable explosive device. The doll's outer layers hides its inner workings. Creates substantial damage at the same time as it pays tribute to the motherland.

incendiary_grenade.name: Incendiary Grenade
incendiary_grenade.description: The Incendiary Grenade is a nasty self igniting phosphorus container. It ignites after a few seconds, making it perfect for bouncing off walls towards your enemies. Upon ignition it causes serious damage – setting enemies ablaze.

hef_grenade.name: HEF Grenade
hef_grenade.description: This is an updated version of the classic hand grenade. Even though the original frag grenade is still in use, this new sleek design will provide that OVERKILL touch to each blast. Still as cheap and still as effective.

ace_of_spades.name: Ace of Spades
ace_of_spades.description:
Throwing cards are generally associated with magicians splitting watermelons across a stage but add weight and razor edges and you have a silent killer. Have one of these steel aces in your sleeves and you will always be ready to deal yourself into the game, regardless of the circumstances.
The Ace of Spades is a free throwable given to the community to celebrate two years of PAYDAY 2!

concussion_grenade.name: Concussion Grenade
concussion_grenade.description: This stunning little beauty will take everyone's breath away, giving you those couple of extra seconds you need to kill them.

frag_grenade.name: Frag Grenade
frag_grenade.description: The frag grenade is a concept that has changed little from its inception. It is a thrown casing that explodes, sending shards and splinters away with such force they can slice through flesh, bone and light armor. Cheap and effective.

molotov_cocktail.name: Molotov Cocktail
molotov_cocktail.description: The Molotov cocktail is perhaps the simplest weapon that can call itself a grenade. Nothing more than a breakable bottle of flammable liquid with a 'fuse' replaced by a burning rag. It is cheap, simple and highly effective.

dynamite.name: Dynamite
dynamite.description: Swedish engineer. Alfred Nobel, discovered dynamite and its effectiveness in blastic rock. But it was drunk prospector. Ol' Kenneth, who discovered its effectiveness in blasting people.

shuriken.name: Shuriken
shuriken.description:
Like a sword hidden in the user's hand the shuriken is a deadly weapon and perfectly silent. First made of nails and needles, the throwing star has had a long history filled with blood and battle. These modern stars of stainless steel will pose a lethal threat to anyone in front of you, and as long as you can find them there will be no stopping you.
The Shurikens have been coated in poison which deals damage over time and has a chance to interrupt enemies.

javelin.name: Javelin
javelin.description: With its origins lost in murky pre-history, the javelin is a simple weapon. After all, it's a thrown stick with a pointy end that ruins someone's day. Despite this simplicity, it still requires skill and strength to use.

throwing_knife.name: Throwing Knife
throwing_knife.description: A solid backup plan and a reliable tactic for a precise and silent kill. The Throwing Knife has been present in martial history for as long as people grew tired of throwing objects in a general direction and wanted a reliable weapon instead.

throwing_axe.name: Throwing Axe
throwing_axe.description: A sharp axe is never wrong, and as this one is especially good when throwing, it got popular amongst bikers. Riding a bike, can sometimes be dangerous, and you need some "protection". So this sporting axe suddenly ran out of stock as bikers found it extra handy for highway battles.

stoic_hip_flask.name: Stoic's Hip Flask
stoic_hip_flask.description: An antique flask from 1882 bearing the inscription "Stoic" and "JW Spirits", given to Duke in his youth when he trained with Buddhist monks. Duke keeps it filled with his favorite whiskey; taking a swig is a symbolic gesture of calming and gives the bearer a moment of zen-like focus, easing away damage.

pocket_ecm_device.name: Pocket ECM Device
pocket_ecm_device.description: A small device for intercepting and overriding nearby encrypted signals. With sophisticated algorithms for sniffing out and disrupting wireless data, the Pocket ECM Device gives the user an edge both while hiding in the shadows and in the heat of combat.

smoke_bomb.name: Smoke Bomb
smoke_bomb.description: Drop one of these and you'll vanish in a cloud of smoke, leaving your enemies struggling to take aim at you. Dodging bullets is a piece of cake when they can't see you properly.

gas_dispenser.name: Gas Dispenser
gas_dispenser.description: A small gas dispenser that temporarily enhance the body's senses and provide healing effect for two allies.

injector.name: Injector
injector.description: When consumed the user ceases to feel pain and becomes fearless. The lack of pain lets the user rampage through the heart of battles longer than any other and the lack of fear makes him a frightening and obvious threat for his enemies.
